item.title: Seven killed in Kyiv in new Russian aerial attack
item.description: Russian missiles and drones hit residential areas and hospitals in Ukraine's Kyiv region, the interior minister says.

item.title: Strait of Hormuz: What happens if Iran shuts global oil corridor?
item.description: Iran's threat to block the world's most vital oil transit point has raised fears of major global economic consequences.

item.title: US asks China to stop Iran from closing Strait of Hormuz
item.description: Iran's Press TV had earlier reported that parliament had approved a plan to close the Strait.

item.title: Dozens of soldiers seized in Colombian mountains
item.description: The military says the civilians were acting under pressure from dissidents of the Farc rebel group.

item.title: First celestial image unveiled from revolutionary telescope
item.description: The telescope should detect killer asteroids and may even find the ninth planet in our solar system.
